duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, modify, and evaluate analog and mixed signal products and modules, components, or integrated circuitry.
Analyze equipment to establish operating data and conduct experimental tests, applying pre-silicon verification and post-silicon validation methods.
Select components and equipment based on analysis of specifications and reliability, as well as review vendor capabilities to support product development.
Develop new and/or enhance existing technical systems (whole systems, parts, components) including software and/or hardware as well as various products.
Responsible for development planning and strategy in close collaboration with other functions (e.g. marketing, operations), and development of generic and market-oriented products.

Ensure developments are based on state-of-the-art research and technology, and apply research based on scientific methods for quality improvement, process optimization, new products, or business areas.

education_certification.credential: A 4-year completed study with a particularly extensive subject-specific additional qualification or a relevant completed study with 4+ years to acquire the total knowledge and skills.
